metadata.name: ARMC kitsune #1
metadata.description:
❝AR Mask Club❞

This is our first NFT collection.
ARMC -kitsune-

1,111 3D Color Generative kitsune masks with face-tracking AR wearable from Japan.

Website: https://armaskclub.com/

Twitter: https://twitter.com/armaskclub

Artist : Reo Suzumura
AR Creator : Haruma Kida
Creative Director : BENA

You can wear your own NFT from here.
https://www.instagram.com/ar/2194547127377555/

※Please open this URL on your smartphone.

※If you cannot open this URL, please search the AR filter on Instagram app. e.g. armckitsune0(with your kitsune number) or ARMC kitsune#0(with your kitsune number)

※Or you can find the AR filter from this Instagram account.
https://www.instagram.com/armaskclub/

- About ARMC -
AR Mask Club combines the modern youth culture of AR filters with "mask" an art form that humans have loved since ancient times. ARMC was founded for the purpose of pursuing possibilities of AR wearable in NFT space and creating a sustainable ecosystem for artists, especially AR creators who have a hard time monetizing their creatives.

We believe the act of wearing a mask is not only about becoming someone different from yourself or just to hide your face, but a way to discover a new aspect of yourself. There is more in you than you think. Be daring.

Wear a mask & Show your world.
